about.title: About Me
about.whoIAmText: I'm a passionate developer from Chad with expertise in building scalable web and mobile applications. I love turning ideas into reality through clean, efficient code.
about.whatIDoText: I specialize in full-stack development using modern frameworks like React, Node.js, and more. I create responsive, intuitive interfaces and robust backend solutions.
about.myMissionText: To deliver high-quality digital solutions that make a real impact, combining technical excellence with creative problem-solving.

services.title: Services
services.webDevDesc: Full-stack web applications built with React, Node.js, and modern technologies
services.mobileAppDesc: Cross-platform mobile apps with React Native and Flutter
services.uiDesignDesc: Beautiful, user-centric interfaces that engage and convert
services.consultingDesc: Strategic guidance for your tech projects and digital transformation
